name: Rough Francis - Maximum Soul Power Vinyl 12" LP
description:
The debut LP from our tight bros. ROUGH FRANCIS from Burlington, VT. People get ready for power soul riffs in the tradition of The MC5, The Jam, Iggy & The Stooges & The Damned.

Tracklist:
1. Ruffians 02:37
2. I-90 East 03:23
3. Black & Red 02:41
4. Staring Out The Window 03:00
5. Not A Nice Guy 03:51
6. Home Invasion 02:59
7. Righteous 02:35
8. Comm To Space 05:55

Limited Stock! Get em while they last!

name: The Dwarves - We Only Came To Get High 7" Vinyl Glow In The Dark 2nd Pressing
description:
Tweet

Riot Style proudly presents: ROCK LEGENDS, THE DWARVES!!! Limited edition GLOW-IN-THE-DARK 7" vinyl! Recognize The Dwarves! Never before seen second pressing. The Dwarves return to party with RIOT STYLE for this ltd. edition exclusive. Single includes We Only Came To Get High B/W I'm Not Dead. Featuring a now legendary photo cover by Tony Stamolis (T & T & A). Second pressing limited to 1000 PCS on glow in the dark COLOR CHANGE 7" vinyl!!! Another Riot Style exclusive! 2nd Pressing Limited To 1000 Copies RST-666 The Dwarves - We Only Came To Get High Tracklist: A. We Only Came To Get High B. I'm Not Dead WARNING: CONTAINS NUDITY. YOU MUST BE 18 YEARS OR OLDER TO ORDER THIS PRODUCT Now Shipping!

name: Blag Dahlia (The Dwarves) - Metrosexual Man 7" (Colored Vinyl)
description: Brand new 4-song 7" EP from The Fresh Prince of Darkness, BLAG DAHLIA of ROCK LEGENDS THE DWARVES. Electro-power-pop-punk-rock and old-school hip hop from punk rock's finest MC Blag the Ripper! Featuring performances from producer Eric Valentine and Kevin Cole of the Turbo AC's. Songs about Metrosexual Men, Paris & Nicole, Sex, Lettuce and Drugs! RST-007 A. 1. Metrosexual Man 2. The Simple Life B. 3. Baby Romaine 4. North of The Border First pressing limited to 500 copies on Metrosexual pink colored vinyl w/ Neon labels! NOW SHIPPING!!!

name: Blag Dahlia (The Dwarves) - Metrosexual Man 7" (Glow In The Dark Test Pressing)
description:
LESS THAN 50 COPIES AVAILABLE LIMITED EDITION COLOR CHANGE GLOW-IN-THE-DARK 7" TEST PRESS ON PINK GLOW-IN-THE-DARK Vinyl!!! ZOMG!!!!!


Tweet

We got a bunch of collector nerds emailing us after the last Dwarves seven inch if they could get test pressings, so we decided to make some available for this new release. Brand new single from The Fresh Prince of Darkness, BLAG DAHLIA of ROCK LEGENDS THE DWARVES. RST-007-TP A. 1. Metrosexual Man 2. The Simple Life B. 3. Baby Romaine 4. North of The Border Riot Style presents another industry first: PINK color change glow in the dark vinyl! You don't have to buy it. Hell, you probably can't afford it! UPDATE NOW SHIPPING! LESS THAN 25 COPIES LEFT!

name: **SOLD OUT** Brooke Smith "Sunday Matinee" 80s Hardcore Photos Curated By Tim Barber
description:
We have a real limited supply of Brooke Smith's Sunday Matinee photo zine. This large format newsprint photo zine was lovingly curated by Tim Barber (Tiny Vices, Primary Photographic).

"Brooke Smith was a teenager immersed in the boiling mid-80s hardcore scene of downtown Manhattan. Her intimate photographs, from ‘83 to ‘88, reveal an underground scene at its most potent in a city’s troubled era. These bands were the backdrop for Smiths adolescence: Agnostic Front, Bad Brains, The Cro Mags, Murphy’s Law, Underdog, The Icemen, Armed Citizen, Urban Waste, No Thanks, The Abused, Warzone, Violence, The Young n Useless, Adrenalin OD, The Nihilistics, Rapid Deployment, The Psychos, The Misguided, The Stimulators, Sheer Terror, Ultra, Antidote, Hinkley Fan Club, Reagan Youth, Bold, Crackdown, Krieg Kropf, Supertouch, Crumbsuckers, Sick of It All, Kraut, Scab, False Prophets, Heart Attack, PMS, Gilligan’s Revenge, Major Conflict, Leeway, YDL, Cause for Alarm, The Mob, Modern Clix and Token Entry. Brooke Smith’s photographs tell the complex story of youth trying to find and maintain community amidst an aggressive and volatile music scene."

This 52-page, large format, limited edition photo zine comes complete with an introduction written by Gavin McInnes (Street Carnage / Do's & Don'ts)

Half of these have the black & white cover and half have this cool cmyk offset printing of the same image. Which cover you get is random.

artists.name: S.T.R.E.E.T.S. (Vancouver, BC) [Skateboarding Totally Rules Everything Else Totally Sucks]

name: S.T.R.E.E.T.S. - Invaders From Gnars CD
description: S.T.R.E.E.T.S. - Invaders From Gnars CD Skateboarding totally rules everything else totally sucks. The third album from Vancouver's kings of skate metal. Spaced out skate punk featuring members of Pink Mountaintops, Children, Bison & Pride Tiger. For fans of Suicidal Tendencies, Thin Lizzy, DRI, Black Flag, Corrosion Of Conformity, Bones Brigade & Yes. Featured on Thrasher's Skate Rock Vol. 12. Gatefold Digipak w/ CD
